Maintain.title: We are currently under maintenance
Maintain.description: We are working hard to bring you a better experience. Please come back later.

LogIn.title: To save this page to Notion, you need to be logged in to your workspace first.
LogIn.description: By signing up, you agree to our <terms>Terms</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

FQA.title: Can't login?
FQA.description: If you keep getting logged out frequently or cannot login at all, try enabling third party cookies.

Database.title: Untitled
Database.tips: If your desired database does not appear, please refresh and try again.
Database.success:
Database selection successful. 
Please close the page.
Database.guide: In the following steps, please follow the guide to select a Notion database as the container for storing data.

LogIn.title: Please log in to Notion
LogIn.description: To save this page to Notion, you need to be logged in to your workspace first.

SelectedDatabase.title: Please select a database
SelectedDatabase.description: You need to select a database as the container for storing data

MultipleDatabases.title: Select a database
MultipleDatabases.description: You have authorized multiple databases. Please select one as the container for storing data. If the desired database is not in the list, please click [Refresh Databases] to try again or [Reauthorize].

NoDatabase.title: No database found
NoDatabase.description: No databases found. Click [Refresh Databases] to try again or [Reauthorize].

SingleDatabase.title: Authorization successful
SingleDatabase.description: One database found. If the desired database is not in the list, please click [Refresh Databases] to try again or [Reauthorize].

Database.contactSupport: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me
Database.scanQRCode: Scan the QR code below to add customer service WeChat and join the group
